Verses: 1 sidharadikkiravan Un Mugaththukku Munbaaga Varugiraan; Aranaik Kaaththukkol, Vazhiyaik Kaavalpannu, Araiyaik Kettiyaaik Kattikkol, Un Belanai Migavum Sthirappaduththu.

2 verumaiyaakkugiravargal Avargalai Verumaiyaakki, Avargaludaiya Dhraatchakkodigalaik Keduththuppottaalum, Karththar Yaakkobin Magimaiyaith Thirumbivarappannuvadhu Pol, Isravelin Magimaiyaiyum Thirumbivarappannuvaar.

3 avanudaiya Paraakkiramasaaligalin Kedagam Raththamayamaagum; Avanudaiya Yuththaveerar Raththaambaran Thariththukkondirukkiraargal; Avan Thannai Aayaththampannum Naalile Radhangal Juvaalikkira Kadagangalai Udaiyadhaayirukkum; Eettigal Kulungum.
4 radhangal Therukkalil Kadakadavendrodi, Veedhigalil Idasaari Valasaari Varum; Avaigal Theevattigalaippola Vilangi, Minnalgalaippola Vegamaaip Parakkum.
5 avan Than Prabalastharai Ninaivukooruvaan; Avargal Thangal Nadaigalil Idari, Alangaththukku Viraindhu Oduvaargal; Maraividam Aayaththappaduththappadum.
7 avan Siraippattuppogath Theermaanamaayitru; Avaludaiya Thaadhimaargal Thangal Maarbile Adiththukkondu Puraakkalaippola Saththamittuk Koodappovaargal.
8 ninive Poorvakaalamudhal Thanneerth Thadaagampol Irundhadhu; Ippodho Avargal Odippogiraargal; Nillungal Nillungal Endraalum, Thirumbippaarkkiravan Illai.
9 velliyaik Kollaiyidungal, Ponnaiyum Kollaiyidungal; Sambaththukku Mudivillai; Ichchikkappadaththakka Sagalavidha Porulgalum Irukkiradhu.
10 aval Verumaiyum Veliyum Paazhumaavaal; Manam Karaindhupogiradhu; Muzhankaalgal Thallaadugiradhu; Ellaa Iduppugalilum Migundha Vedhanai Undu; Ellaarudaiya Mugangalum Karugippogiradhu.
11 singangalin Vaasasthalam Enge? Paalasingam Iraithingira Idam Enge? Kizhachchingamaagiya Singamum, Singakkuttigalum Bayappaduththuvaarillaamal Sanjarikkira Sthaanam Enge?

12 singam Than Kuttigalukkuth Thevaiyaanadhaip Peera Than Pensingangalukku Vendiyadhaith Thondaiyaip Pidiththuk Kondru, Iraigalinaal Than Kebigalaiyum, Peerippottavaigalinaal Than Thaabarangalaiyum Nirappitru.

13 idho, Naan Unakku Virodhamaaga Vandhu, Radhangalaip Pugaiyezhumba Eriththuppoduven; Pattayam Un Paalasingangalaip Patchikkum; Nee Iraikkaagap Pidikkum Vettaiyai Dhesaththil Atruppogappannuven; Un Sthaanaapadhigalin Saththam Inik Ketkappaduvadhillaiyendru Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar.
